GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: arkfb: Check the size of screen before memset_io()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0701df594bc1d7ae55fed407fb65dd90a93f8a9c, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 681e14730c73cc2c71af282c001de6bc71c22f00. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: video: fbdev: arkfb: Check the size of screen before memset_io()
